argument.name: fieldname
argument.description: The name of a table field used in a form or browse.

page.description: Returns TRUE if the field is not blank.
page.discussion: ISNOTBLANK() returns .T. (TRUE) if Field_Name contains a value; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE). The function can be used is event coding for forms and browses.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following code could be attached to a button on a form.
section.example: isnotblank("Company") -> .T. if Company contains "Alpha Software" isnotblank("Company") -> .F. if Company contains ""

section.description: The following code could be used in an Xbasic script.
section.example:
dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.fetch_first() ? tbl.firstname = "Michael
" ? isnotblank("tbl.firstname") = .T. tbl.change_begin(.t.) tbl.firstname = "" tbl.change_end(.t.) ? isnotblank("tbl.firstname") = .F.
